sentences:
Andes to Amazon is a nature documentary TV series co - produced by the BBC Natural History Unit in Bristol , England and Animal Planet , first transmitted in the UK on BBC2 in November 2000 .
In other territories it was broadcast under the title Wild South America 
The series features extensive aerial photography of major landforms shot by Bob Fulton , and footage of rarely glimpsed animals in the wild .
Andes to Amazon was narrated by Fergal Keane and produced by Karen Bass .
The series forms part of the Natural History Unit 's Continents strand , and was preceded by Land of the Tiger in 1997 and followed one year later by Congo .
